title: A Sensible Migration
description: Agatha has lived a long life at Puffin Heights, but still dreams of an old flame, Samuel, and what could have been.
quote: My loins still long for your feathery bosom.
altHero: an elderly female bird sits at an open window at sunset, writing a letter with a quill
alt2: the elderly bird has died and she falls to the ground
alt3: a male bird arrives with watery, sad eyes
alt4: he dies and falls draped over her body
